mapper.select: SELECT P.POST_ID, P.TITLE, TO_CHAR(P.CONTENT) AS CONTENT, COUNT(PL.POST_LIKE_ID) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM TB_POST P LEFT JOIN TB_POST_LIKE PL ON P.POST_ID = PL.POST_ID WHERE POST_ID = #{ num } GROUP BY P.POST_ID, P.TITLE, TO_CHAR(P.CONTENT)

SELECT C.POST_ID, C.COMMENT_ID, M.EMAIL, FLOOR(SYSDATE - C.CREATED_AT) AS REGIST_DATE, C.CONTENT, COUNT(CL.COMMENT_LIKE_ID) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM TB_COMMENT C LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN TB_COMMENT_LIKE CL ON C.COMMENT_ID = CL.COMMENT_ID WHERE C.POST_ID = #{pNum} GROUP BY C.POST_ID, C.COMMENT_ID, M.EMAIL, (SYSDATE - C.CREATED_AT), C.CONTENT
